meanings.definition: A person who passes by or through a place.
meanings.sent1: The passer walked quickly past the park.
meanings.sent2: The passer waved as they strolled by the store.
meanings.sent3: The passer accidentally bumped into a sign while looking at their phone.
meanings.sent4: The passer of the torch handed it off smoothly to the next runner.
meanings.sent5: The passer in the crowd stood out with their bright red hat.

meanings.definition: A player who throws or hands the ball to a teammate in sports.
meanings.sent1: The football passer made a perfect throw to the receiver.
meanings.sent2: The basketball passer assisted in scoring a goal with a great pass.
meanings.sent3: The baseball passer pretended to throw the ball to confuse the opponent.
meanings.sent4: The soccer passer skillfully maneuvered the ball past the defenders.
meanings.sent5: The volleyball passer set up the perfect spike for their teammate.

meanings.definition: A document or ticket that allows a person to pass through a gate or enter a building.
meanings.sent1: The security guard checked the passer's ticket before letting them in.
meanings.sent2: The airport passer quickly showed their boarding pass and proceeded to the gate.
meanings.sent3: The museum passer accidentally dropped their ticket and had to retrieve it.
meanings.sent4: The event passer held up the VIP pass to gain exclusive access.
meanings.sent5: The theater passer smoothly scanned their ticket and entered the auditorium.
